item.title: Seamless Production Deployment with Elastic Beanstalk
item.description: Introduction Production deployments can be complicated. You want to avoid disruption to your users and minimize downtime, but you also need to consider cost, time, risk, and how to recover from a failed deployment. You can balance the trade-offs between these considerations by choosing a deployment strategy. AWS Elastic Beanstalk is a managed AWS compute [â€¦] Link to article: https://aws.amazon.com/blogs/dotnet/seamless-production-deployment-with-elastic-beanstalk/
